La Nouvelle-cosse annonce 146 cas de COVID-19 aujourdhui, 3 mai. Il y a en tout 943 cas actifs dans la province. Pour plus dinformation, lisez le communiqu : https://t.co/Nqicdgq9Qb https://t.co/3ishURhYEB
Nova Scotia is announcing 146 cases of COVID-19 today, May 3. There are a total of 943 active cases in the province. For more, read the news release: https://t.co/LAKmvr0DJD https://t.co/NUtOS4uwba

Rapid testing is encouraged for people who: are 16+ do not have symptoms have not travelled have not visited a potential exposure location have not been in contact with someone who has tested positive

DYK: Rapid tests are different from the COVID-19 tests you book online? Rapid tests are completed at drop-in pop-up locations and do not add to the @HealthNS laboratory's workload. For pop-up site locations and dates, click here: https://t.co/pLmJrW5auj https://t.co/E63Ctt7jHs

For people who cant get to a food bank or local food support program, Feed Nova Scotias COVID-19 Food Box program is available. Call 211 weekdays between 8am and 8pm to see if this program is a good fit.

Need help? Looking for community resources? Visit https://t.co/bh3wXae5Gq for information on food banks, local food support programs, mental health and addiction services, financial assistance, and more.
